text: Péry-La Heutte is a new municipality in the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2015, the former municipalities of La Heutte and Péry merged into the new municipality of Péry- La Heutte. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois Category:2015 establishments in Switzerland
title: Péry-La Heutte
